name: Meadows of Dreamland
description:
---CONTROLS---

  • SPACE : Jump / Make Tricks !
  • E : Magic Spell
  • S : Go under a platform / Fall faster
  • C : Say dreamy things !
  • Enter : Exit tuto

---PAD-COTNROLS---

  • DownButton ( Xbox A or Playstation X ) : Jump / Make Tricks !
  • LeftButton ( Xbox X or Playstation Square ) : Magic Spell
  • Joystick Down or Pad down : Go under a platform / Fall faster
  • Up Button( Xbox Y or Playstation Triangle )  : Say dreamy things !
  • Start : Exit tuto

90% of Sound FX are homemade !

---How to play---

You have to go as far as you can accross the meadows of dreamland ! 

Do a maximum of tricks before the end ! 

You also have to avoid the creature living in this world ! Beware to not fall into a nightmare !! 

Dont forget to eat cookies ...

---Story---

Everything start with a dream..

How long can you stay asleep ? :)

---About the Jam---

Mini Jam 105

Theme : Dreamy

Limitation : Every Playthrough is Unique : https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-105-dream  Special thanks to them !
